title: Little advice to every Iron ,Bronze and silver : READ THE DAMN PATCH NOTES
body:
No, {{champion:6}} isn't damn cheating or hacking when he spam his W.

You just need to learn to use that thing called reading skills of yours after every update and read, gosh no wonder people stuck in their elo and keeping others stucks cause they can't bother to read.

replies.body: Uh, you do realize even diamonds, masters, and challengers don't read patch notes?

> [{quoted}](name=Rester,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fjITE4rM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-03-24T01:50:41.092+0000)
>
> Uh, you do realize even diamonds, masters, and challengers don't read patch notes?

I mean then walk around and cry hacking

> [{quoted}](name=FSRER,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fjITE4rM,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-03-24T07:55:55.526+0000)
>
> Happened at lcs...they lost

One of the most popular outcomes of that kinda thing I remember is people trying to flash Reksai ult and even the commentators were like "YOU CANT FLASH THAT ANYMORE"

> [{quoted}](name=Rester,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fjITE4rM,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-03-24T11:28:45.403+0000)
>
> One of the most popular outcomes of that kinda thing I remember is people trying to flash Reksai ult and even the commentators were like "YOU CANT FLASH THAT ANYMORE"

Lol
Reading patch notes, a hobby of mine

> [{quoted}](name=Iota Theta,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fjITE4rM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-03-24T01:54:17.310+0000)
>
> Reading patch notes, a hobby of mine

xD
